alert.note: Alert for South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 2:30PM AKST until December 12 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range
